Author: marialesgo
Content:
Guys.. I wanna share a vocabulary to use.
Convoluted = berbelit-belit

Especially of an argument, story or a sentence.

Author: f4rtl0rd
Content: Thats good, i forgot abt that word

Author: f4rtl0rd
Content: I usually use "...speak/talk around in circles." = Jadi kayak omongannya muter2, or ruwet/ribet somthin like that

Author: marialesgo
Content:
"convoluted" = berbelit-belit, atau sulit dipahami.
contoh :
His explanation was so convoluted that I couldn't understand a thing.
(Penjelasannya begitu berbelit-belit sampai aku tidak mengerti apa-apa.)

kata persamaannya : _*complicated, confusing*_ .

Author: marialesgo
Content:
Actually there's a difference about use speak and talk...
Wait let me give the short differences.

Author: f4rtl0rd
Content: I guess "to talk" means it needs 2 or more person, whereas "to speak" are like more formal & can be 1 way???

Author: marialesgo
Content:
speak : use for formal/ speech / language
talk : use for casual/ chatting / conversation

so, if you want to say " *_how many language do you speak?_* "
not " *_how many language do you talk?_* "

Author: f4rtl0rd
Content: Make sense, thanks btw

Author: marialesgo
Content:
Generally both "speak" and "talk" involved 2 or more people. 
But in some context. Speak can be used if you only speaking to yourself. 
"He was speaking to himself " (ini lebih makes sense)
"He talked to himself" ( ini agak aneh kedengerannya)

Author: longlifelearner22
Content:
hi indah! thank u for responding,

anw in my case, i understood english and could speak in english quite well, but still can't speak it fluently (i can speak fast enough but i dont think my convos are effectives considering i still use a lot of umm.. , and filler words too like (like.. , i think... , u know what im sayin.. )

i sometimes also _mendapati_ myself not pronouncing the words natively (i lean to US accent) THOUGH i understand accent its not the main focus, its about your talking partner knew what youre trying to say or not etc etc.. but icl i want to master accents bcs i think its super cool and i want to sound more convincing like indah hehe

do u guys have any tips to improve my english so that i can speak more fluent and sound more 'native'?

Author: m.i8622
Content: i feel like as long as your speaking partner understands you, that‚Äôs convincing enough you don‚Äôt really need to sound any different tho

Author: meyokoe
Content: Try to fix your grammar because no hate, you did miss some words here and there, and you probably lack the vocabulary, accents are more-so the byproduct of your enviroment's dialect to which you should just intake more US-accent content and try to incorporate it even more

Author: meyokoe
Content: Don't try to rely on your partner to understand you, try to better your communication skills so that the room for error of misunderstanding is lower

Author: agustineee
Content: + learn to boost your self-confidence before you going to learn communication skills. a better mindset gets easier practices
